titlealts.searchtitle: Supporting Information: Location Type Codes (Retired) - Description

p.b: Location Type Codes has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. The codes have been added to the Attribute LOCATION TYPE CODE.
The last live version of the Location Codes is available in the January 2011 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
